title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 2573/78 of 30 October 1978 on the application of Decision No 2/78 of the EEC-Turkey Council of Association relating to proof of origin for certain textile products exported by Turkey
header:
Council Regulation (EEC) No 2573/78
of 30 October 1978
on the application of Decision No 2/78 of the EEC-Turkey Council of Association relating to proof of origin for certain textile products exported by Turkey
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the purpose of implementing the Association Agreement between the European Economic Community and Turkey, Decision No 2/78 of the Council of Association shall be applicable in the Community.
The text of the Decision is annexed to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1978.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 30 October 1978.
For the Council
The President
J. Ertl
